Title: Notice Board at the Northern Entrance
Text:
Faded Notice Board
Before... your sightseeing adventure, please... to familiarize yourself with the Natural Reserve Sightseeing Guide:
The natural reserve... to the south of the gallery roads. For your safety, please refrain from... the barrier netting and entering... without proper authorization.
The use of fire is strictly prohibited in... violators... prosecuted.
For better conservation, please refrain... feeding the Hoochiefs.
